F9BECCBA1998447E9BA4FB9DC083C56A.description: I can transition smoothly from formal to informal styles of behavior, respond effectively to nonverbal cues and mediate situations of cultural misunderstanding with empathy.

2DF366B628834C1184C61BC0196FC1BA.description: I can show empathy and cultural sophistication in my language when interacting in social, academic or professional situations with others from the target culture.

9D09A32C5A91471E8EA7F4EABC732835.description: I can engage with complexity and pluricultural identities and serve as a mediator between and among cultures.

E19997A5E2304013B8620C51EEAA5392.description: I can adhere to basic social and professional norms and etiquette, read nonverbal cues and adjust my behavior in complicated situations.

CCA474AA8E5843119F8C0E6D24800BA3.description: I can suspend judgement, adapt my language, and make appropriate cultural references when interacting with others from the target culture in social and professional situations.

1623A4A485524DFB8CA777A9EF73E829.description: I can interact in complex situations to ensure a shared understanding of culture.

A4D52D497457400C9BD7E1959DD0C525.description: I can demonstrate awareness of subtle differences among cultural behaviors and adjust my behavior accordingly in familiar and some unfamiliar situations.

A75FDB1D025442CE9A6DE65B6584DEBD.description: I can converse comfortably with others from the target culture in familiar and some unfamiliar situations and show some understanding of cultural differences.

6469C5D075F149C5A6CE30C755AA3891.description: I can interact at a competent level in familiar and some unfamiliar contexts.

41EEB0F5EB734CB3863165519FC03DB8.description: I can recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders.

5E7E8AECF4AD4051B9856A822B4EC796.description: I can converse with peers from the target culture in familiar situations at school, work, or play, and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences.

D0E714BBE96B4B2289B703CAE10D1468.description: I can interact at a functional level in some familiar contexts.

F0EDF638DF6248A497A503A90384BBBC.description: I can use appropriate rehearsed behaviors and recognize some obviously inappropriate behaviors in familiar everyday situations.

937AB5A0B3F64DF7AC2A75C0C9D10F6A.description: I can communicate with others from the target culture in familiar everyday situations, using memorized language and showing basic cultural awareness.

4CABF5850E8449CDB57E08A4E0D2F24E.description: I can interact at a survival level in some familiar everyday contexts.

7E740FA7B0D042C09C25FB89C8E371D3.description: Interact With Others In And From Another Culture

DCF9DECBBE6944C68FA1F6C8691D1209.description: In my own and other cultures I can evaluate a wide range of concrete and abstract practices from different viewpoints.

75FC34B691D0425BAFCBF1104D4C2EDC.description: In my own and other cultures I can evaluate a wide range of concrete and abstract products from different viewpoints.

04776A5C897840B9916ACF24B7A903E6.description: In my own and other cultures I can objectively evaluate products and practices and mediate perspectives.

4273C8F8950C421CB39280AA47D7A0D5.description: In my own and other cultures I can analyze how practices within informal and formal situations are related to perspectives.

E922B70B694A4CF58665D5A3C5107A09.description: In my own and other cultures I can analyze how products of personal and public interest are related to perspectives.

180FCEC33E1348E8BE92E0BEA6AC5056.description: In my own and other cultures I can suspend judgment while critically examining products, practices, and perspectives.

ADE066BF39D94B2DA68C4D3550B72FD1.description: In my own and other cultures I can explain how a variety of practices within familiar and social situations are related to perspectives.

1EB8AFFF597B4A40BF00970FDD8D5290.description: In my own and other cultures I can explain how a variety of products of public and personal interest are related to perspectives.

CBE95910276A4394B35B301A12FC095C.description: In my own and other cultures I can explain some diversity among products and practices and how it relates to perspectives.

A62804F172034F35A585C02D744F7B64.description: In my own and other cultures I can compare practices related to everyday life and personal interests or studies.

E3AF35C392414DC58E03D6E1FA118567.description: In my own and other cultures I can compare products related to everyday life and personal interests or studies.

D7D55DDB35D647F9B43560570CCC73D3.description: In my own and other cultures I can make comparisons between products and practices to help me understand perspectives.

99BA592EBD0E4D088BD610C5C12FB9AF.description: In my own and other cultures I can identify some typical practices related to familiar everyday life.

79A3DFA050C045F0B03419FF5B0F6C55.description: In my own and other cultures I can identify some typical products related to familiar everyday life.

45C9A24B3E834575ACE95B68344AF98A.description: In my own and other cultures I can identify products and practices to help me understand perspectives.

C2E97EBEA56F436DAB75BF62D44C4495.description: Investigate Products And Practices To Understand Cultural Perspectives

63C3C6C744A849EBB12FE11DAC314586.description: I can deliver sophisticated presentations with accuracy, efficiency and effectiveness on global and highly abstract concepts in my field of expertise, adapting my language to the characteristics of the audience and embedding cultural perspectives.

71F9720273E640C99ED49C8647F80BCD.description: How can I present information to inform, describe, or explain?

37D6805D419E4D00B0B334635917FCB5.description: I can tailor a sophisticated presentation to advocate my own or anotherâ€™s point of view or to persuade an audience whose attitudes and cultural perspectives may be different from my own.

AD3B5D9B54C74FDCB8783B0EB939ED03.description: I can narrate succinctly and precisely, often using historical or cultural references to engage an audience whose cultural attitudes, expectations and perspectives may be different from my own.

559344B62F234B0BAB826C577DBBD5C7.description: How can I present information to narrate about my life, experiences and events?

5844A5A8FDE94017ABC0B7765980ADA7.description: I can deliver sophisticated and articulate presentations on a wide range of global issues and highly abstract concepts, fully adapting to the cultural context of the audience, using spoken, written, or signed language.

530FB57D93AD4026B9494A6195F8F1F5.description: I can deliver clearly articulated and well-structured presentations to various audiences on abstract or hypothetical issues and ideas, ranging from broad general interests to areas of specialized expertise.

F6667DE4054F47F68F8449CA67A5125E.description: I can deliver a clearly articulated and well-structured argument, refute counterarguments, and give extensive supporting evidence on abstract or hypothetical issues and ideas, ranging from broad general interests to areas of specialized expertise.

F07953B2783C4122966B6D99595A1045.description: I can present clearly-articulated, coherent and detailed narrations on complex, abstract issues and hypothetical issues.

D13A13B7E56E46019F5EDA06A6BAC172.description: I can deliver extended presentations on abstract or hypothetical issues and ideas ranging from broad general interests to my areas of specialized expertise, with precision of expression and to a wide variety of audiences, using spoken, written, or signed language.

46FC0E1112B948C39A19453C46C32E16.description: I can deliver cohesive presentations on a variety of complex concrete topics related to community interests and some specialized fields, and often deal with related issues hypothetically.

EAC7C86C953F48B1914302C6B54AC672.description: I can deliver detailed presentations and elaborate on a variety of concrete academic, social and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs across major time frames.

20416DFA39E946CCB28071D76501F3DF.description: I can present an argument with supporting evidence, based on a variety of concrete academic, social and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs across major time frames.

12991DADA4E5467B992E6C00B90C40F9.description: I can state a viewpoint with supporting evidence on some concrete academic, social and professional topics of interest using paragraphs across major time frames.

75D73487F53149748BDC9D7C150C9B0D.description: I can give complex detailed narrations beyond the concrete, often addressing abstract experiences or hypothetical issues.

AFBD795FA5424E33904BCD40FFF0321C.description: I can tell stories based on concrete experiences in academic, social, and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs across major time frames.

7C2083FB12D145C9A22BDFF0248FBA83.description: I can tell stories about school and community events and personal experiences, using paragraphs across major time frames.

B808076526594E03BC05918FF1AF2E1E.description: I can deliver detailed and organized presentations on familiar as well as unfamiliar concrete topics, in paragraphs and using various time frames through spoken, written, or signed language.

9D54B9E9988E41CBBAC90E83695CFAD8.description: I can give detailed presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some concrete topics I have researched, using a few short paragraphs, often across various time frames.

928B467B855A422BAF7DC72D3A704853.description: I can give straightforward presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some concrete topics I have researched, using sentences and series of connected sentences.

3EA2ECBB779D404FB6AAC2AF86180067.description: I can state my viewpoint about familiar topics and give some reasons to support it, using sentences and series of connected sentences.

FA6BF04F401D441D9DBDF658187EAA1B.description: I can express my preferences on familiar and everyday topics of interest and explain why I feel that way, using simple sentences.

051A1069C780435CAFFEC9954C27D146.description: I can present information on both very familiar and everyday topics using a variety of practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences through spoken, written, or signed language.

1C023AF774374748B60B0F9F6239BD3B.description: I can tailor language to a variety of audiences by adapting my speech and register in culturally authentic ways.

5DFE48C340744C68ACF8A236EB2D8C90.description: How can I express, react to, and support preferences and opinions in conversations?

E01647E2CA094EF993141D08E1DFA580.description: I can interact and negotiate to resolve highly abstract and complex matters in culturally appropriate ways on a wide variety of topics and to persuasively advocate a point of view that is not necessarily my own.

521B6C4EB303470D86CF67B633EF44BC.description: How can I meet my needs or address situations in conversations?

B6E42D02EED147508FA5BCD494597381.description: I can debate complex issues and abstract ideas skillfully and succinctly, tailoring language to the cultural context of the interaction, using cultural and historical references as appropriate.

4DAA49AD3AB849989AEAC7D43434174F.description: How can I exchange information and ideas in conversations?

A4E9813ADA06427C81B0B82AC296D172.description: I can interact, negotiate, and debate on a wide range of global issues and highly abstract concepts, fully adapting to the cultural context of the conversation, using spoken, written, or signed language.

75E07750D4A64DE4944748D122B66892.description: I can discuss and debate opinions and advice with multiple participants on a wide variety of complex issues and abstract ideas, concretely, abstractly, and hypothetically.

DE197D7B9E0042EEB11D8EBED43F0B05.description: How can I express, react to, and support preferences and opinions in conversations?

D3B72A44E21D4A828D961B33B81E1569.description: I can interact and negotiate to resolve abstract and complex matters on a wide variety of topics in a variety of situations.

9EF1B489DC3E4196B37315D8D1F4283F.description: How can I meet my needs or address situations in conversations?

8C3E475EAEAE4FBC8169E3A4FBB44172.description: I can discuss and debate a wide variety of complex issues and abstract ideas using precise, sophisticated, and academic language.

CF23C52BDE0F44CFA5069E1C79FB72F2.description: How can I exchange information and ideas in conversations?

B276CFF42D92440893B80CE27A2F19E3.description: I can participate fully and effectively in spontaneous spoken, written, or signed discussions and debates on issues and ideas ranging from broad general interests to my areas of specialized expertise, including supporting arguments and exploring hypotheses.

E2164BE84844405EB7409AEA573824F0.description: I can discuss, support, and sometimes debate opinions and advice on a variety of complex concrete topics, often addressing hypothetical or abstract issues, and asking precise questions.

0F7BF4994A3A42F7A419D18F01E81834.description: I can maintain extended conversations by supporting, reacting to, and comparing preferences and opinions and expressing advice and emotions in detail across major time frames, and by asking probing questions.

3FE52F64170C4175BF9701E5ED9A0CBA.description: I can maintain conversations by providing explanations and comparisons of preferences, opinions, and advice on familiar and concrete academic and social topics using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

A704116A66264158A89C8F03CA856957.description: How can I express, react to, and support preferences and opinions in conversations?

C22D752C7DF8497D87EB2D1084ADCB03.description: I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication in a situation that is generally unfamiliar.

F054EB2B6D364DBD963328933A399516.description: I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication that arises in a familiar situation, providing detailed explanations and offering a variety of resolutions across major time frames.

22378CFA7D964F3C8ECFA0FDA09A1172.description: I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication that arises in a familiar situation, using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

FC4BF302802F43CE905A08BF4EC9BBDF.description: How can I meet my needs or address situations in conversations?

E47FF68FD8004B849A93B84107E85A36.description: I can discuss and sometimes debate a variety of complex concrete and some abstract academic, social and professional topics and often deal with related issues hypothetically, using precise questions and explanations.

6F23F866D0F44B648FF946825E5BEE15.description: I can maintain discussions on a wide variety of familiar and unfamiliar concrete topics of personal and general interest, and sometimes academic, social or professional topics, by using probing questions and providing detailed responses across major time frames.

41499096691E45B48117534C99BE1183.description: I can exchange information and ideas in discussions on a variety of familiar and concrete academic and social topics, using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

F318B9076D3B4897AA4D075AE33C209C.description: How can I exchange information and ideas in conversations?

CDA342FEE4D34F5A9B156F311C65B5BC.description: I can maintain spontaneous spoken, written, or signed conversations and discussions across various time frames on familiar, as well as unfamiliar, concrete topics, using series of connected sentences and probing questions.

25C16933A7DA4EACA34CA94BF8AA3DF2.description: I can explain preferences, opinions, and emotions and provide advice on a variety of familiar and some concrete topics that I have researched, using connected sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

4D86B3C07F6F4D278E0A9861666F5C69.description: I can exchange preferences, feelings, or opinions and provide basic advice on a variety of familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of follow-up questions.

69F6AF048FB54DC9A7EE83EBD4CD2A74.description: I can express, ask about, and react with some details to preferences, feelings, or opinions on familiar topics, by creating simple sentences and asking appropriate follow-up questions.

DA62FA99A26345CC89ABBEDB620F8733.description: I can interact with others to meet my needs in a variety of situations, sometimes involving a complication, using connected sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

4F81485A2B6C4339A5A6108106C437EA.description: I can exchange information in conversations and some discussions on a variety of familiar and some concrete topics that I have researched, using connected sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

0D3317911A7B4A6883419FB6B48D0A6B.description: I can usually follow the main story and actions expressed in various time frames in paragraph-length fictional texts.

3D28F77285104A7993F9C13C30EA092A.description: I can understand the main idea and key information in short straightforward fictional texts.

2F9276B62FA74D098BF5AFA91D786CC3.description: I can identify the topic and related information from simple sentences in short fictional texts.

C2875DCA5C4049D0A5D671B2EA5605C3.description: What can I understand, interpret or analyze in authentic fictional texts that I hear, read or view?

5DF5DBC338724C2CA727D7D4F87D965B.description: I can usually follow the main message in various time frames in straightforward, and sometimes descriptive, paragraph- length informational texts.

2C6B7FC2BDEC4FB999963A49F2BE5E10.description: I can understand the main idea and key information in short straightforward informational texts.

C3DC54F05CB34232B4846FE76CA819F9.description: I can identify the topic and related information from simple sentences in short informational texts.

DB002BF5EB5344B79857E66AFB3B757A.description: What can I understand, interpret or analyze in authentic informational texts that I hear, read or view?

A5877B42D2C3496491E0A2FD8BFB7C10.description: I can understand the main idea and some pieces of information on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences within texts that are spoken, written, or signed.

2B7C1AAB42524AB8AA388AE681B81A24.description: I can understand familiar questions and statements from simple sentences in conversations.

BA53560DB8644C1497F8D0E747D64E35.description: I can identify some basic facts from memorized or familiar words and phrases when they are supported by gestures or visuals in conversations.

D8DA50421EE94D23871DF63900B09304.description: I can understand memorized or familiar words when they are supported by gestures or visuals in conversations.

F9B2BE6EDD5240B48F928EE67733C480.description: What can I understand, interpret or analyze in conversations and discussions that I hear, read or view, in which I am not a participant?

4367DCB317D44A4CA9982A0A7C4E7F47.description: I can identify the topic and some isolated elements from simple sentences in short fictional texts.

5C9A32C886FF44DF9B5EDCEF1A014682.description: I can identify some basic facts from memorized or familiar words and phrases when they are supported by gestures or visuals in fictional texts.

0098CFAC28314A6ABC3B1B6B9E9404C1.description: I can identify memorized or familiar words when they are supported by gestures or visuals in fictional texts.

4A3D719995FE4A2AB4DE70E244CFC1A5.description: What can I understand, interpret or analyze in authentic fictional texts that I hear, read or view?

4232739B05AE4D038782AD1C4E806A07.description: I can identify the topic and some isolated facts from simple sentences in informational texts.

5CF6C62990794FC2A06BD24539DB6D76.description: I can identify some basic facts from memorized or familiar words and phrases when they are supported by gestures or visuals in informational texts.

02625E2C405B4DFF9AE1769B3D6DE8D5.description: I can identify memorized or familiar words when they are supported by gestures or visuals in informational texts.

354825EF66A441A9B1BBC4C6EBCC26AD.description: What can I understand, interpret or analyze in authentic informational texts that I hear, read or view?

866027BFC261458D807FD84466DB3C35.description: I can identify the general topic and some basic information in both very familiar and everyday contexts by recognizing practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences in texts that are spoken, written, or signed.
